TopicTitle: Welcome to the new Kerbal Network forum!

Articles.Content:
Well, not so much as renewed!

We've removed the old sub-forums because some of them weren't getting any posts, and because they didn't cover all parts of the KSP Network. Instead, you can now post directly in this forum with one of the thread prefixes for the forums, the wiki, the bugtracker, the website etcetera. So, if you're experiencing issues with any part of the official KSP network, this is the place to be
So, you have merged several sub-sub-forums together? Good idea.
Good change, subforums seem to be less discoverable for people.
